## CreateModelInput type

All identifiers and fields used to create a model

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CreateModelInput<Model extends Record<string, unknown>, ModelMeta extends Record<string, unknown>> = Equal<ModelIdentifier<ModelMeta>, {
    id: string;
}> extends true ? Partial<ModelIdentifier<ModelMeta>> & Omit<MutationInput<Model>, 'id'> : MutationInput<Model>;
```
